src:
Huawei Mate 30 in Mate 30 Pro prihajata v Evropo, a z eno izjemo!

03 Nov 2019, 13:46

Pametna mobilna telefona Huawei Mate 30 in Mate 30 Pro sta med uporabniki storitev mobilne telefonije zelo priljubljena, pa čeprav nimata prednaloženih aplikacij YouTube, Google Maps in Gmail. Tudi trgovine Google Play Store ni na novincih, kar je sicer nekaj povsem samoumevnega za naprave Android 10 izven Kitajske. To bo sicer držalo tudi za pametna mobilna telefona Huawei Mate 30 in Mate 30 Pro, ki bosta naprodaj na evropskem trgu, in sicer predvidoma sredi novembra.
Trenutno še ni podatka o tem, kje v Evropi bo pametna mobilna telefona Huawei Mate 30 in Mate 30 Pro mogoče kupiti, omenja pa se države, kot so Nemčija, Francija, Španija, Italija, Združeno kraljestvo in Švica. Nedvomno pa bo zanimivo videti, kako se bosta Huawei Mate 30 in Mate 30 Pro pomerili na evropskem trgu, saj imajo naprave nameščen mobilni operacijski sistem Android 10, vendar jim manjka storitev Google Play Store, kjer najdemo številne uporabne mobilne aplikacije.
Na spletu pa so se sicer pojavile še informacije o maloprodajnih cenah novincev. Za nakup vstopne različice pametnega mobilnega telefona Huawei Mate 30 bo treba odšteti 799 evrov, za zmogljivejši model Mate 30 Pro pa 1.099 evrov. Model Mate 30 Pro s podporo mobilnemu omrežju 5G bo pričakovano dražji, saj bo zanj v prosti prodaji treba odšteti 1.199 evrov.



Povezave: Huawei
text:
The Huawei Mate 30 and Mate 30 Pro are coming to Europe, but with one exception!

03 Nov 2019, 12:46

Huawei Mate 30 and Mate 30 Pro smartphones are very popular among mobile phone users, even though they do not have YouTube, Google Maps and Gmail apps pre-loaded. Even the Google Play Store is not new to the news, which is something that goes without saying for Android 10 devices outside China. This will also hold true for Huawei Mate 30 and Mate 30 Pro smartphones for sale in the European market, scheduled for mid-November.
Currently, there is no information on where in Europe the Huawei Mate 30 and Mate 30 Pro smartphones can be purchased, and countries such as Germany, France, Spain, Italy, the United Kingdom and Switzerland are mentioned. Undoubtedly, it will be interesting to see how the Huawei Mate 30 and Mate 30 Pro will fare in the European market, as the devices have Android 10 mobile operating systems, but they lack the Google Play Store, where we find many useful mobile applications.
Information on the retail prices of newcomers has also appeared online. The entry-level version of the Huawei Mate 30 smartphone will cost $ 799, and the more powerful Mate 30 Pro will cost $ 1,099. The Mate 30 Pro, with support for the 5G mobile network, is expected to be more expensive as it will have to be deducted $ 1,199 in free sales.



Links: Huawei
